name: Gerasimos Karmanlis
personality: Responsible and reliable, but with a quick temper.
story: Gerasimos Karmanlis was born in Athens, Greece. He joined the military at a young age and worked his way up the ranks due to his skill and dedication. He has served in various missions and is well-versed in both ground and air operations. Gerasimos is married to his high school sweetheart and has a young daughter. He hopes to retire from the military eventually and start his own business.
